translation.en: Kill you! Kill you! Kill you! Kill you! Kill you!
- There's no boys in the School for Good? - Ugh, there's plenty.
translation.es: - ¿No hay chicos en la otra escuela? - Hay muchos.

translation.en: And get ready to be nauseous.
As per tradition, the winning school from last year…
translation.es: Según la tradición, la escuela ganadora del año pasado…

translation.en: Us again. Imagine that!
- Hmm. Imagine. - …will now grace us all
translation.es: No me lo creo. …nos deleitará con una muestra de sus galantes talentos.

translation.en: with a display of their chivalrous talents.
translation.es: …nos deleitará con una muestra de sus galantes talentos.

translation.en: - Ugh. - Gentlemen!
What a bunch of losers.
Oh my.
- Aren't they wonderful? -
If you boys are finished with dance class, maybe you'd like to have a real fight.
translation.es: Si ya terminaron con la clase de baile, ¿están listos para luchar?

translation.en: Oh no.
What do you say?
- - Who… is… that?
It's Tedros!
His dad was king,
so of course he has to have his own stupid entrance.
translation.es: así que debe tener su propia estúpida entrada.

translation.en: You know what? Let's make it easy for you.
Charge!
Yes!
I don't know what the big deal about owning a round table is, anyway.
translation.es: No entiendo qué tiene de fantástico tener una mesa redonda.

translation.en: His father was King Arthur?
- Yawn. - Wow.
- - Nice work, fellas.
Let's see how you do in a real fight, pretty boy.
translation.es: Veamos cómo te va en una pelea real, niño bonito.

translation.en: Prepare to die.
Get him! Get him!
Oh, come on.
If we're gonna do this, we might as well do it right.
translation.es: Si vamos a hacer esto, hagámoslo bien.

translation.en: Oh, come on! Foul!
Anybody! He's got a magical sword.
How's that fair?
That's Excalibur.
Really?
I know. How evil of me.
Dammit.
Oh, how good of you to lose again.
translation.es: Qué bueno que pierdas de nuevo.

translation.en: Bravo! Bravo!
- A heroic display! -
- Excuse me, milady. I believe, uh-- - That I don't belong here? Yeah, I know.
translation.es: Disculpa, creo que… ¿Que no pertenezco aquí? Sí, lo sé.

translation.en: Don't want your stupid rose anyway.
translation.es: Igual no quiero tu tonta rosa.

translation.en: Oh, and by the way, this is what a normal girl looks like.
translation.es: Y, por cierto, así es como se ve una chica normal.

translation.en: He intended it for me.
Normal girl.
There's an open seat next to me, Teddy.
And, for the record, you don't know what I was about to say, but…
translation.es: Para que conste, no sabes lo que iba a decir, pero buen intento.

translation.en: nice try.
What did he smell like?
Ego.
In these two schools, we will take away any confusion
translation.es: En estas dos escuelas, eliminaremos cualquier confusión

translation.en: and make your souls as pure as possible.
translation.es: y haremos que sus almas queden lo más puras posible.

translation.en: Pure Good.
Or pure Evil.
Future heroes and villains, you have been chosen
translation.es: Futuros héroes y villanos, fueron elegidos

translation.en: to protect and maintain
the balance between Good and Evil.
translation.es: el equilibrio entre el bien y el mal.

translation.en: For if that balance is ever compromised--
translation.es: Pues, si ese equilibrio es puesto en riesgo…

translation.en: I don't think we need to get into that just now with our new friends, do we?
translation.es: No me parece el momento indicado para hablar de eso.

translation.en: - - It's such a happy first day.
translation.es: El primer día es tan alegre.

translation.en: - Let's not be downers, hmm? -
Besides, I'm sure this new class will perform exceptionally well.
translation.es: Además, seguro que a esta nueva clase le irá excepcionalmente bien.

translation.en: And like your parents before you, you are all here because
translation.es: Al igual que sus padres, todos ustedes están aquí

translation.en: the world of story needs great heroes and villains
translation.es: porque el mundo de los cuentos necesita grandes héroes y villanos

translation.en: to teach the people of the outside world
translation.es: para enseñarle a la gente del mundo exterior

translation.en: to make choices to find their way.
translation.es: a tomar decisiones y hallar su camino.

translation.en: So, obey the rules, study hard, and remember,
translation.es: Así que sigan las reglas, estudien mucho y recuerden que la Autora solo le da sus propias aventuras

translation.en: the Storian only chooses the very best of our students
translation.es: y recuerden que la Autora solo le da sus propias aventuras

translation.en: for their own adventure.
But what if we've been dropped in the wrong school?
translation.es: ¿Y si llegamos a la escuela incorrecta?

translation.en: Or there's been a mistake and we need to go home immediately?
translation.es: ¿O si hubo un error, y debemos irnos?

translation.en: There are no mistakes in the School for Good and Evil,
translation.es: No hay errores en la Escuela del Bien y del Mal.

translation.en: so… have a nice semester.
translation.es: Espero que tengan un buen semestre.

translation.en: All students, report to your assigned sleeping quarters.
translation.es: Todos los estudiantes, repórtense a sus dormitorios asignados.

translation.en: - - Perfect.
The Good do not room with Evil.
translation.es: El bien no comparte con el mal.

translation.en: - Reena… - Hmm? Tell the fairies to come get my bags.
translation.es: Reena, dile a las hadas que recojan mis maletas.

translation.en: - I'm moving. -
Mm, but I'll miss you so.
Try not to ruin anything.
Sweet dreams, Never.
- Hey! -
- - No, no, no! No, you don't understand! I need to find my friend!
translation.es: No entienden. Tengo que encontrar a mi amiga.

translation.en: Ugh, I told you we'd get her.
translation.es: Sí. Te dije que terminaría aquí.

translation.en: Let me guess.
- It's Belle. -  Or Anastasia. Or Sugar Plum.
translation.es: Te llamas Bella, Anastasia o Dulcinea.

translation.en: - Actually, my name is Sophie. -
- Ah! - You two have no manners.
Welcome to room 66.
I'm Dot, daughter of Robert de Rainault.
translation.es: Soy Dot, hija de Robert de Rainault.

translation.en: - Robert… - Hello? The Sheriff of Nottingham.
It's okay. He's not, like, super famous.
translation.es: No te preocupes. No es tan famoso.

translation.en: Yeah, who's ever heard of Robin Hood?
translation.es: Sí, ¿quién ha oído hablar de Robin Hood?

translation.en: - - Learn your history, cream puff.
Anyway, that's Anadil.
- And that ray of sunshine is Hester. -
translation.es: Y este rayito de sol es Hester.

translation.en: - - You can bunk next to me, Sophie.
That's a funny name for a villain.
translation.es: Qué nombre más curioso para un villano.

translation.en: - - Oh, please.
- She's so not a villain. - Of course I'm not.
translation.es: - No es una villana. - Claro que no lo soy.

translation.en: Look at me.
Do I look like a witch?
Or a troll? Or some disgusting old hag?
translation.es: un trol o una vieja horripilante?

translation.en: That hag is my mother.
Okay, eyes up, Agatha.
It's just a Cupid, stupid.
translation.es: Es solo un cupido. Qué tonta.

translation.en: Okay, don't be lame.
Don't be lame.
You got this.
Uh, hi.
Students aren't allowed on the ledge.
translation.es: No se permiten estudiantes en la cornisa.

translation.en: Prepare for punishment!
- - And I thought Gavaldon was bad.
translation.es: Y yo que creía que Gavaldon era malo.

translation.en: All right, princess. What's so important we had to trek all the way up here?
translation.es: Bien, ¿qué es tan importante que tuvimos que caminar hasta aquí?

translation.en: I'm in heels, you know.
- It's the Readers. -
And their insistence that they shouldn't be where they are.
translation.es: Y su insistencia en que están en el lugar equivocado.

translation.en: - And something does feel wrong. -
The only thing that feels wrong
translation.es: Lo único que se siente mal

translation.en: is the School Master's decision to bring them here in the first place.
translation.es: es la decisión del rector de traerlas aquí.

translation.en: What if he did make a mistake?
What if he dropped them in the wrong schools
translation.es: ¿Y si las puso en las escuelas incorrectas,

translation.en: and something terrible happens?
He'd never admit it.
He'd blame one of us to save face, and you know what would happen then.
translation.es: Nos culparía a una de nosotras, y ya sabes qué pasaría después.

translation.en: There is no mistake. Besides, I'd think you'd be happy.
translation.es: No hay ningún error. Además, deberías estar feliz.

translation.en: I'm stuck with yet another underachiever.
translation.es: Fui yo la que recibió a otra estudiante mediocre.

translation.en: Sophie of Gavaldon.
What? What? No. Whatever do you mean?
Pfft. Please.
Evil hasn't won anything in over 200 years.
translation.es: El mal no ha ganado en más de 200 años.

translation.en: Well, you've come close a couple of times.
translation.es: Casi ganaron un par de veces.

translation.en: Close doesn't cut it!
I just have to work my students twice as hard.
translation.es: Tengo que exigirles el doble a mis alumnos.

translation.en: Because a world where Evil is not as powerful as Good
translation.es: Si el mal no es igual de fuerte que el bien,

translation.en: is a world out of balance.
Now, if you'll excuse me…
…I have a lot of work to do.
Lesso!
Stay away from Sophie, little witch.
- She has a destiny to fulfill. -
And she belongs to me now.
Where are you, Sophie?
I'm sure your mother's beautiful on the inside.
translation.es: Tu mamá debe ser hermosa por dentro.

translation.en: - - I have to get to the other school.
translation.es: Debo cambiar de escuela. Soy buena.

translation.en: - I'm Good. - Yeah, at disguising your Evil.
I am not Evil.
Let's settle this with science.
If she's Good, the fairies will catch her when she falls.
translation.es: Si es buena, las hadas la salvarán.

translation.en: But if she smashes on the rocks in a gruesome, skull- splintering death,
translation.es: Si tiene una horrible muerte al chocar contra las rocas,

translation.en: she's Evil.
The second one. Do the second one.
But she is a villain. She just doesn't know it yet.
translation.es: Sí es una villana, solo que aún no lo sabe.

translation.en: No, I'm Good!
Aw, she whines like an Ever.
Smells like an Ever. - - Has hair like an Ever.
translation.es: Huele y tiene el pelo de una siempre.

translation.en: Or had.
Hey!
Not the hair!
You want proof that I'm Good? Then get a mirror, and look in it.
translation.es: ¿Quieres probar que soy buena? Mírate en el espejo.

translation.en: You hag!
Told ya. Definitely Evil.
- Sophie! - Aggie!
- - Aggie, hey.
- Come on. - Wait, where are we going?
To get you out of here.
- Oh, good. - Not good.
Some… thing is after you.
I saw it.
Okay.  So we're ending this now.
Aggie, no! It's not worth it!
- Come on. - Agatha's plan was simple.
translation.es: Vamos. El plan de Agatha era simple.

translation.en: Find the School Master
and plead their case to leave the school directly to him.
translation.es: y pedirle directamente que las deje irse de la escuela.

translation.en: There was only one problem.
How do we get in?
He definitely came up here. I saw it.
Hey! Let us in!
Great.
Now we're stuck up here.
Would they be prepared for what awaited them in the shadows?
translation.es: ¿Estarán preparadas para lo que les espera en las sombras?

translation.en: Agatha called into the darkness.
Hello?
- But there was no response. -
Who is that?
Sophie discovered that books lined the walls,
translation.es: Sophie vio que las paredes estaban cubiertas de libros,

translation.en: filled with stories from every corner of the world.
translation.es: llenas de cuentos de cada rincón del mundo.

translation.en: - You know we hear you narrating, weirdo. -
If you're trying to scare us, it's not working.
The girls heard a scratching in the blackness.
translation.es: Las chicas oyeron un ruido en la oscuridad.

translation.en: They moved warily toward it.
Oh, you've got to be kidding me.
- - All of that, and it's a dumb pen?
Sophie, stop!
- Don't touch! -
You know, no students have ever made it into my tower. I knew you were special.
translation.es: Son las primeras en entrar a mi torre. Sabía que eran especiales.

translation.en: The Storian began writing your story before you even arrived.
translation.es: La Autora escribió sus historias antes de que llegaran.

translation.en: Guess that's why I'm so confused as to why the two of you want to leave.
translation.es: Quizá por eso no logro entender por qué se quieren ir.

translation.en: She wants to leave. I don't.
translation.es: Ella se quiere ir. Yo no.

translation.en: Sophie, I have to get you out of here.
translation.es: Sophie, tengo que sacarte de aquí.

translation.en: Ahem. Ladies, ladies. I can assure you, you are both perfectly safe here.
translation.es: Señoritas, les aseguro que están perfectamente a salvo aquí.

translation.en: We pride ourselves on protecting our Readers.
Really? Then what about the spinning tower of blood I just saw obsessing over Sophie?
translation.es: ¿Y cómo explica la torre de sangre que está obsesionada con Sophie?

translation.en: Well, my friend, you see, there are so many random spirits
and personalized spells flying around this school, even I can't keep up.
translation.es: de tantos espíritus y hechizos personalizados.

translation.en: Well, I think she's in danger.
So, unfortunately, we can't just languish here
translation.es: Por desgracia, no podemos cruzarnos de brazos

translation.en: while you train us to be in some silly fairy tales.
translation.es: mientras nos entrena para aparecer en cuentos tontos.

translation.en: Our graduates live the very real events that change the world,
translation.es: Nuestros graduados experimentan los eventos que cambian el mundo,

translation.en: which become the stories that change the world.
translation.es: y que luego se convierten en los cuentos que cambian el mundo.

translation.en: You're trying to tell me that Snow White
and Cinderella and Jack and the Beanstalk were real?
translation.es: ¿Quiere decir que Blancanieves, la Cenicienta y Jack y las habichuelas mágicas eran reales?

translation.en: As were Hercules
and Sinbad
and El Cid
and all the others who have battled the forces of Evil.
translation.es: y todos los demás que han luchado contra las fuerzas del mal.

translation.en: We teach you how to fulfill your destiny.
translation.es: Les enseñamos a cumplir sus destinos.

translation.en: And that's exactly what I wanna learn, but you put me in the wrong school.
translation.es: Y eso quiero aprender, pero me puso en la escuela incorrecta.

translation.en: I'm supposed to be in Good.
translation.es: Debería estar en la del Bien.

translation.en: You made a mistake.
- Hmm. - Sir.
Well, perhaps I have. But I'll need you to prove it.
translation.es: Quizá me equivoqué, pero necesito que lo demuestres.

translation.en: Why, if it's your mistake?
Because once something is written by the Storian,
translation.es: Sí, pero una vez que la Autora escribe algo,

translation.en: only the Storian can change its course.
translation.es: solo ella puede cambiar su destino.

translation.en: This is ridiculous.
How are we supposed to change its mind, if it even has one?
translation.es: ¿Cómo la haremos cambiar de opinión? Si es que siquiera tiene una.

translation.en: Oh, but it does.
And there's only one way, really.
What is the one thing that Evil can never have
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo único que el mal no puede tener

translation.en: that Good can never do without?
Oh, I know. Manners.
A castle.
Amazing hair. A horse.
True love.
Which is traditionally manifested in a kiss.
translation.es: Que tradicionalmente se manifiesta con un beso.

translation.en: So you're saying…
I can't believe I'm actually saying this.
translation.es: No puedo creer que diga esto.

translation.en: If Sophie were to kiss her true love,
translation.es: Si Sophie besara a su amor verdadero,

translation.en: that would prove to Quilly over there that you were wrong about us?
translation.es: ¿eso le probaría a la pluma que se equivocó?

translation.en: If one from School of Evil won true love's kiss,
translation.es: Si alguien de la Escuela del Mal obtuviera el beso del amor verdadero,

translation.en: it would change everything.
And I could stay and switch schools? Sophie.
This is all I've ever wanted, Aggie. I can't go back to Gavaldon.
translation.es: Siempre quise esto. No puedo regresar a mi vida en Gavaldon.

translation.en: Not to my old life.
translation.es: No puedo regresar a mi vida en Gavaldon.

translation.en: I will never get this chance again.
Please, let me do this.
- I'll think about it. - Excellent.
Well, I guess somebody better go find herself a prince to kiss.
translation.es: Bueno, más te vale que busques un príncipe para besar.

translation.en: But remember, dear Reader,
no kiss comes without its price.
- Wait, what does that mean? -
- Good morning, darlings! -  Rise and shine!
The first event of the semester, the Evers Ball, is only two weeks away,
translation.es: El primer evento del semestre, el Baile para Siempre, se realizará en solo dos semanas,

translation.en: and you've got a lot to learn.
- Good morning. - Good morning.
Good morning, Agatha.
- - Wake up, despicables!
♪ God, it's brutal out here ♪
Who's that?
- Dark… Dark hair. - Tristan.
translation.es: - El de pelo oscuro. - Es Tristan.

translation.en: I caught his rose.
I hope he invites me to the Evers Ball.
You have to get a boy to ask you, or you fail.
And you do not want to fail.
Three fails, and you're expelled.
- Wait, you mean they kick you out? - Uh…
They actually turn you into something else.
Like a talking tea kettle
or a mouse or something much worse.
translation.es: un ratón o algo mucho peor.

translation.en: Wait, like forever? What?
Uglify!
- Why do we need to be ugly? -
- Hort! Wake up! -
Oh, because it makes little children cry.
translation.es: Para hacer llorar a los niños.

translation.en: Wrong.
- That's merely a bonus. -
Why be revolting and repugnant?
translation.es: ¿Para qué necesitamos ser asquerosos y repugnantes?

translation.en: My question exactly.
Ah, not caring how you look
translation.es: Que no te importe cómo te ves

translation.en: forces you to use your intelligence.
translation.es: te obliga a usar tu inteligencia.

translation.en: Ugliness is freedom!
My tooth just fell out.
translation.es: Se me acaba de caer un diente.

translation.en: It's disgusting. And I don't care.
translation.es: Es asqueroso, y no me importa.

translation.en: And that is power!
- - Bring it down, girls.
- - I am Professor Anemone,
and I am here to show you how to become a truly powerful woman
translation.es: y estoy aquí para enseñarles cómo convertirse en mujeres verdaderamente poderosas

translation.en: through beauty.
A lady's smile is a sword
translation.es: La sonrisa de una dama es su espada

translation.en: in the battle for life and for true love.
translation.es: en la batalla por la vida y el amor verdadero.

translation.en: - So, pick up your mirrors… -
…and strike!
- Lovely, Reena. - Thank you, Professor.
Exquisite, Beatrix.
I'm sorry. This just feels so wrong.
Smiling? That's how you're empowering us?
Smiling is a strict requirement for passing this course.
translation.es: Sonreír es un requisito para aprobar este curso.

translation.en: So, show me your smile if you don't want to fail.
translation.es: Así que muéstrame tu sonrisa si no quieres fracasar.

translation.en: My… smile?
- I don't feel safe. - Mm- hmm.
Wait. What is that?
A fail, Reader.
Wait, you're… you're failing me for being a bad smiler?
translation.es: ¿Me dio un fracaso por tener una mala sonrisa?

translation.en: - Yeah. Let's get to work. -
Ah, now, prepare to drink up
and see how ugly and powerful you can be.
translation.es: y ver lo feos y poderosos que pueden ser.

translation.en: - Reader. -
You're first.
No. I don't want to be ugly.
- It's not who I am. -
Not yet. Hort!
Uh, yes, sir, Professor Manley.
Sorry about this.
But don't worry. You'll still look beautiful to me.
translation.es: Pero no te preocupes, igual te encontraré hermosa.

translation.en: It's, um, Agatha, right?
- Hi. - Do you mind if I sit with you?
- No. - Great.
- If you want to. - Uh…
I'm Gregor.
Um, Gregor Charming.
The, uh… the prince's son.
I'll try not to be too charming.
- I'm Agatha. - I heard you don't want to be here.
translation.es: Soy Agatha. Oí que no quieres estar aquí. Bueno, yo tampoco.

translation.en: Well, I don't either.
translation.es: Oí que no quieres estar aquí. Bueno, yo tampoco.

translation.en: - You don't? - I'm not cut out to be a prince.
translation.es: - ¿No? - No estoy hecho para ser príncipe.

translation.en: It's… It's not who I am.
Do you know what I'd rather do? Run my own grocery store.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué preferiría hacer? Tener mi propia tienda.

translation.en: - Wait, really? - Yeah.
I love food, but I wouldn't sell meat 'cause I can't stand the sight of blood.
translation.es: Amo la comida, pero no vendería carne porque no soporto ver sangre.

translation.en: That's actually why I got a fail today. I got nicked in a duel.
translation.es: Por eso recibí un fracaso hoy. Me corté el dedo.

translation.en: I'm sorry, they failed you for one tiny cut?
Not quite.
I saw the blood, and I passed out in my heavy armor.
translation.es: Vi la sangre y me desmayé con mi armadura pesada.

translation.en: I was on top of a hill,
translation.es: Estaba en la cima de la colina,

translation.en: and so I started rolling down,
knocking over everyone in my path.
translation.es: y boté a todos en mi camino.

translation.en: - Definitely grocery- store material, right? -
I think you should do whatever makes you happiest, Gregor.
translation.es: Deberías hacer lo que te haga feliz, Gregor.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Gregor, will… will you excuse me?
Sure. See you around, Agatha.
- - Thanks.
- Did you get attacked? - Yes.
By tadpoles.
In ugly class.
Well, I failed beauty class.
translation.es: Yo recibí un fracaso en la clase de belleza.

translation.en: What part did you fail? Smiling.
Smiling?
Forget it. I found you a prince to kiss.
I already found my true love. - - Tedros.
translation.es: Ya encontré mi verdadero amor. Tedros.

translation.en: We had a connection from the moment we saw each other.
translation.es: Tuvimos una conexión desde que nos vimos.

translation.en: Plus, we just make sense, aesthetically.
Well, unfortunately, Beatrix already has him.
translation.es: Por desgracia, Beatrix ya lo reclamó.

translation.en: You think she's prettier than me?
I'm just saying we need someone who's available now.
translation.es: Solo digo que necesitamos a alguien que esté disponible.

translation.en: School Master said it had to be true love's kiss.
translation.es: Debe ser un beso de amor verdadero.

translation.en: Sophie, a kiss is a kiss.
translation.es: Sophie, un beso es un beso.

translation.en: Oh, really?
See? Nothing happened.
Has to be true love.
I'm okay to keep this casual.
Aren't you sweet?
Just give him this, and tell him how good and kind I am.
translation.es: Solo dale esto y dile lo buena y amable que soy.

translation.en: And don't be weird.
You know what I mean.  Don't talk about your cat.
translation.es: Sabes a qué me refiero. No hables de tu gato.

translation.en: - Fine. - Fine.
Just get him interested. I'll handle the rest.
translation.es: Solo haz que se interese. Yo me encargo del resto.

translation.en: Get off me!
- - Who are you?
I am the Gnome of the Blue Forest.
translation.es: Soy el gnomo del Bosque Azul.

translation.en: But I thought gnomes were supposed to be short.
I thought princesses were supposed to be likable.
Welcome, students! Gather round.
I need you all to sign in so I know who survived and who hasn't.
translation.es: Anoten sus nombres, así sabré quién sobrevivió y quién no.

translation.en: Hey. Normal girl.
How's the mind reading coming along?
Yeah. No. Sorry about that. That was…
translation.es: Sí. No. Disculpa por eso. Estaba…

translation.en: I was just really overwhelmed when I first got here.
- Yeah. This place can be overwhelming. - Mm.
translation.es: Sí, este lugar puede ser abrumador.

translation.en: Never had a princess cop an attitude like that before, though.
translation.es: Nunca había visto una princesa con tu actitud.

translation.en: Really is quite impressive.
Mm, do they usually all smile and bat their eyes at you?
Yes, they do, which is incredibly boring, so thank you for not being boring.
translation.es: Sí, lo cual es muy aburrido, así que gracias por no hacerlo.

translation.en: Uh, no, I'm actually, uh, pretty boring.
The only person who doesn't think so is my cat.
translation.es: El único que me aguanta es mi gato.

translation.en: Mm, no, I…
Well, they say, uh, cats are good judges of character.
translation.es: Dicen que los gatos juzgan bien a la gente.

translation.en: - They do? - They will.
Now that I've said it.
I'm quite famous here, you know.
- - Number one fairy- tale prince and all.
Yeah, I think… I think when you become king, they're probably gonna have to find a bigger crown
translation.es: Cuando seas rey, necesitarás una corona más grande

translation.en: to fit on that swelled head of yours.
- - Nice. Nice.
This is for you.
- Yeah? - Not from me.
From my friend, Sophie.
Oh, the… the witch with the gorgeous hair?
No, no. She's not a witch. She was just dropped in the wrong school.
translation.es: No, no es una bruja. La dejaron en la escuela equivocada.

translation.en: No, that does not happen, normal girl. She's definitely playing you.
translation.es: Eso no pasa. Está jugando contigo, chica normal.

translation.en: Well, in this case, it did.
Trust me. She is… definitely a princess.
translation.es: Confía en mí. Definitivamente es una princesa.

translation.en: My name is Agatha, by the way.
Much better.
'Cause you're definitely not normal.
translation.es: Porque sí que no eres normal.

translation.en: In a good way.
All right, come on, everybody! Come on, gather round.
- Let's can the balloon juice. -
I am Yuba, the school woods survival expert.
translation.es: Soy Yuba, el experto en supervivencia de la escuela.

translation.en: I've lived in them for hundreds of years, and I haven't died once.
translation.es: Nunca he muerto en mis cientos de años en el bosque.

translation.en: At least…
…not that I can remember.
Oh! That's just a little gnome humor.
translation.es: Eso fue solo un poco de humor de gnomos.

translation.en: So, off we jolly well go.
All right, let's get these doors open.
Go on.
Open!
Open.
Open the forest doors!
Thank you.
- Follow me, everybody! -
You cannot survive any adventure if you cannot survive the woods.
translation.es: No pueden tener aventuras si no pueden sobrevivir en el bosque.

translation.en: The Blue Forest prepares students for any perils you may face.
translation.es: El Bosque Azul los preparará para enfrentar cualquier peligro.

translation.en: Hey.
Hi.
Gregor, what happened to your forehead?
I failed, uh, steed- riding this morning.
translation.es: Me caí de un caballo en la mañana.

translation.en: Turns out I'm not really any good with horses.
translation.es: Parece que soy un mal jinete.

translation.en: And I think I might need glasses.
That grocery store's looking better and better, right?
translation.es: La tienda se ve cada vez mejor.

translation.en: - - Stay away from Tedros, you goon.
- He's mine. -
Hey there.
Come on!
A field of pretty pansies,
but as we know from our fairy tales,
translation.es: Pero, como nos enseñan los cuentos,

translation.en: pretty can sometimes kill you.
translation.es: a veces la belleza puede ser mortal.

translation.en: Cheeky plant.
That's, uh… That's one bouquet you wouldn't want to catch at a wedding.
translation.es: Ese es un ramo que no querrían atrapar en una boda.

translation.en: Gnome humor. Right.
It's okay, Gregor.
It can't get you. You're fine.
I really hate this place.
Quick, quick! Come on.
Ah, this is Yuba's favorite part.
translation.es: Esta es la parte favorita de Yuba.

translation.en: The pumpkin patch.
Benign by day,
but by night, a grisly horror world
translation.es: pero de noche es un mundo de horror

translation.en: where reapers will hunt you down,
translation.es: en el que los segadores los perseguirán,

translation.en: drink your blood,
and sell your limbs for spoils!
translation.es: y venderán sus extremidades por dinero.

translation.en: - - Reapers? What are those?
One of those.
That's just a scarecrow.
And I suppose pansies are just flowers.
translation.es: Y los pensamientos son solo flores.

translation.en: Remember, only the best Evil can disguise as Good.
translation.es: Recuerden, solo el mejor mal puede disfrazarse de bien.

translation.en: - I've gotta get out of here! - No, bad idea.
Let go of me!
Gregor, stop!
You've already got two fails!
Gregor! Gregor!
Gregor, you don't know what they'll do to you!
translation.es: Gregor, ¡no sabes lo que te harán!

translation.en: - Come on, come back! - I'll be fine!
Help me!
Agatha!
Gregor?
Every villain has a special talent they can hone into a powerful weapon
translation.es: Cada villano tiene un talento especial que puede convertir en un arma poderosa

translation.en: to defeat their nemesis.
What's a nemesis?
Your archenemy.
Your story will not end until one of you is destroyed.
translation.es: Su historia no terminará hasta que uno de ustedes sea destruido.

translation.en: Now, I want you to dazzle me
with whatever you believe your unique talent to be.
translation.es: con lo que crean que es su talento único.

translation.en: Hort, you're first.
Well, I've been working on my werewolf powers in hex class.
translation.es: He estado practicando mis poderes de hombre lobo. Mire.

translation.en: All right.
Next time I need a skinny, one- haired werewolf,
translation.es: Cuando necesite un hombre lobo de un pelo,

translation.en: - I'll make sure to call you. Sit down. -
- Dot? - Hmm? Please tell me you can do better.
Watch me.
Is it poisoned?
It… could be.
Well, it's better than a stray hair.
translation.es: Bueno, es mejor que un solo pelo.

translation.en: We can work with that.
Those who are truly Good can summon the animals of the forest.
translation.es: La gente buena puede invocar a los animales del bosque.

translation.en: - Mm. - I used to do it with my squirrel friends. Oh God, give it up.
translation.es: - Solía hacerlo con mis amigas ardillas. - Cielos, ríndete.

translation.en: Why don't you summon a cliff and go jump off it?
translation.es: Mejor invoca un acantilado y lánzate.

translation.en: Why don't you find someone else to have mommy issues with?
Don't you dare talk about my mother.
translation.es: No te atrevas a hablar de mi mamá.

translation.en: You know nothing about her!
I know she did one hell of a good job turning you into a raving lunatic.
translation.es: Sé que crio muy bien a una loca de remate.

translation.en: I despise you, you freak.
And everything you stand for.
Which just proves that I am at the wrong school.
translation.es: Eso prueba que no debería estar aquí.

translation.en: - You want to get out of here, princess? -
This raving lunatic's unique talent would be more than happy
translation.es: El talento de esta loca de remate estaría más que encantado

translation.en: to get rid of you permanently.
translation.es: de deshacerse de ti para siempre.

translation.en: This is delightful.
- Sophie, watch out! -
Be careful, Reader, she's getting really close.
translation.es: Cuidado, lectora, está a punto de lograrlo.

translation.en: Use your talents.
I don't know what they are!
Your squirrel friends, Sophie! Call your squirrel friends!
Help! Help me! Help!
Aw, guess the squirrels don't like you either.
translation.es: Creo que tampoco les caes bien a las ardillas.

translation.en: You poor little princess.
Let me put you out of your misery.
- She's gonna kill her! -
Sophie, you're not allowed to kill anyone until after graduation.
translation.es: Sophie, no puedes matar a nadie antes de la graduación.

translation.en: Call them off!
- Stop! -
Oh my God.
Rafal?
You're doing wonderfully…
…Sophie.
- Move out of the way! - Move!
Hester!
- - You're fine. It's okay.
- It's okay. - Gonna be okay. Breathe.
We'll make sure you're fine, okay? It's okay.
Who is that? Who is Rafal?
Do not say his name again.
translation.es: No vuelvas a decir su nombre.

translation.en: Not to anyone but me.
translation.es: A nadie más que a mí.

translation.en: - Who is he, and how does he know me? - Shh. He's the School Master's brother.
translation.es: ¿Quién es y cómo me conoce? Es el hermano del rector.

translation.en: He was once the most powerful being in our school.
translation.es: Fue el ser más poderoso de nuestra escuela.

translation.en: Evil hasn't beaten Good ever since he disappeared.
translation.es: El mal no vence al bien desde que desapareció.

translation.en: But somehow, your powers… your powers have drawn his attention.
translation.es: De alguna manera, tus poderes llamaron su atención.

translation.en: I didn't know I had powers. I don't want powers. I want to go--
translation.es: No quiero tener poderes, solo quiero…

translation.en: Oh, stop your whining!
What you just did in that classroom
