translation.es: es prueba de que estás donde perteneces.

translation.en: It's not what we are. It's what we do, Sophie.
translation.es: No se trata de lo que somos, sino de lo que hacemos, Sophie.

translation.en: Now go.
And tell no one.
translation.es: Y no le cuentes a nadie.

translation.en: And if Rafal visits you again, you must tell me immediately.
translation.es: Y si Rafal regresa, debes decírmelo de inmediato.

translation.en: Go, go.
If she is the one, Rafal…
translation.es: Si ella es la elegida, Rafal…

translation.en: I'll do everything in my power to deliver her to you.
translation.es: haré todo lo posible por entregártela.

translation.en: My love.
- - No, no, no.
Of course we don't hate.
Evil hates.
Good loves.
Evil attacks.
Good defends.
Chinen, when is Good permitted to attack?
It isn't. Good can only defend.
translation.es: Nunca. El bien solo puede defender.

translation.en: If Good were to attack first, by definition, it would be no longer Good.
translation.es: Si el bien atacara, por definición, ya no sería bueno.

translation.en: Precisely.
What did you people do to him?
I'm sorry?
Gregor failed three times,
and then he disappeared, screaming in pain.
translation.es: y luego desapareció gritando de dolor.

translation.en: What did you turn him into?
The rules at this school must be obeyed.
translation.es: Se deben obedecer las reglas de la escuela.

translation.en: There are no exceptions.
Ladies, as… as I was saying,
Evil has many weapons, but we…
translation.es: el mal tiene muchas armas, pero nosotros…

translation.en: we have animals.
Animals of the land, animals of the water.
translation.es: Los animales de la tierra y del agua.

translation.en: - And so, ladies, today I present to you… -
…wish fish,
translation.es: a los peces de los deseos.

translation.en: shimmering underwater friends,
who understand us and our deepest desires.
translation.es: que nos entienden a nosotros y a nuestros deseos más profundos.

translation.en: Is that because they used to be students here?
Enough.
Not everyone earns their own story.
translation.es: No todos se ganan su propia historia.

translation.en: At least they can still be part of someone else's happy ending.
translation.es: Al menos pueden ser parte del final feliz de otra persona.

translation.en: Ladies, if your wish is strong enough,
translation.es: Señoritas, si su deseo es fuerte,

translation.en: then they might make it come true.
- - Who's first?
Me! Me, me!
- Kiko. -
It's Tristan! He loves me.
Let me try.
- Tristan. - Move, Kiko.
- Move. - Ah. - Get out of the way. -
We look perfect together.
The Evers Ball,
translation.es: Es el Baile para Siempre, donde muchas de ustedes

translation.en: where many of you may receive your first kiss next week!
translation.es: Es el Baile para Siempre, donde muchas de ustedes recibirán su primer beso la próxima semana.

translation.en: Your turn.
Any wish?
Whatever your heart most desires.
translation.es: Lo que sea que tu corazón desee.

translation.en: I wish for home. For all of us.
translation.es: Deseo que todos volvamos a casa.

translation.en: What are you doing?
What's happening?
That's enough now, Agatha. Please stop.
I… I can't let go!
- Get back! Get back! Get back! -
A hundred years since I failed.
A hundred years of granting wishes.
You were the first to wish to free me,
translation.es: y tú fuiste la primera en desear liberarme,

translation.en: to wish me home.
Thank you.
- Run. Run! -  Run! Go, go, go!
Run! Run!
Run! Run! Agatha, get out of there!
Get up!
Get up!
Gregor?
Hey, Gregor.
- No, don't! Get back from it! - Gregor!
Hey, Gregor, I don't know if I can help you or not.
translation.es: Gregor, no sé si puedo ayudarte o no.

translation.en: But if I can, I will.
- I've got you! -
- Don't worry, Agatha! -
- You okay?  -
What did you do? That was my friend!
It was about to kill you! I've just saved your life!
translation.es: Iba a matarte. ¡Te salvé la vida!

translation.en: You pompous ass, you killed him!
- No! - No! Tedros was rescuing you!
Everyone, back to your dorms!
Classes are canceled for the rest of the day.
You, come with me. Go!
- Go, go, go! -
Gregor, I'm so sorry.
- Agatha-- - Stop!
That's what you call Good?
Destroying someone kind
because they can't live up to your impossible expectations?
translation.es: porque no cumple con sus imposibles expectativas?

translation.en: What exactly is good about that?
Agatha, everyone has a role to play here. In time, you will understand.
translation.es: Todos tienen un papel que cumplir. Con el tiempo, lo entenderás.

translation.en: No, I won't.
I told you, I don't belong here.
translation.es: Le dije que no pertenezco aquí.

translation.en: What is wrong with you?
Once upon a time, Good was real and true.
translation.es: En el pasado, el bien era de verdad.

translation.en: Now we are in the age of self- centered perfectionism,
translation.es: Ahora vivimos en la era del perfeccionismo egocéntrico,

translation.en: but you used your wish to save that poor girl.
translation.es: pero tú usaste tu deseo para salvar a esa pobre niña.

translation.en: Do you remember when I told you that magic follows emotion?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas que la magia obedece a las emociones?

translation.en: The most powerful emotion is empathy.
translation.es: La emoción más poderosa es la empatía.

translation.en: The passion you've shown tells me that you,
translation.es: La pasión que demostraste me dice que tú

translation.en: young lady, are exactly where you belong.
You are the first real princess this school has seen
translation.es: Eres la primera princesa de verdad que esta escuela ha visto

translation.en: in a long, long time.
We have to talk.
Did you give Tedros my letter? Yes, but something very bad is going on here.
translation.es: - ¿Le diste mi carta? - Sí, pero está pasando algo muy malo.

translation.en: Yeah, tell me about it.
I just got visited by a swarm of bees that is apparently the most Evil man in the world.
translation.es: Me visitó el hombre más malvado de todos, como un enjambre de abejas.

translation.en: Some guy named Rafal.
That's the guy I saw. No, no, Sophie. We have to get out now, kiss or no kiss.
translation.es: Ese es el tipo que vi. Debemos irnos, con o sin beso.

translation.en: No, wait. What did Tedros say?
He said your friend had one hell of a right hook.
translation.es: Que tu amiga tiene un gran gancho.

translation.en: Oh no. What happened to your eye?
translation.es: Ay, no. ¿Qué te pasó en el ojo?

translation.en: Uh, ask your friend.
You hit him?
Aggie, why?
I just had the nerve to save her life, you know.
Just meet me outside when you're finished doing whatever you have to do.
translation.es: Encuéntrame afuera cuando termines con esto.

translation.en: - - So sorry.
She can be temperamental… and violent, apparently.
translation.es: Puede ser temperamental y violenta, aparentemente.

translation.en: Sophie, right?
Yeah.
You write nice letters.
I just didn't know how else to meet you.
They keep us so separate here.
Yeah, probably best to keep Good and Evil apart. Less messy.
translation.es: Hay menos líos cuando separan al bien del mal.

translation.en: That is, unless you're unlucky enough to be trapped in the wrong school.
translation.es: A menos que estés atrapada en la escuela equivocada.

translation.en: - She's not in the wrong school. -
translation.es: No está en la escuela equivocada.

translation.en: But she's definitely not supposed to be talking to princes.
translation.es: Y no debería conversar con los príncipes.

translation.en: - No! - No, you don't need to drag her--
Tedros, please! I didn't do anything!
- Hey. Hey. -
She's Evil, Teddy. Let them take care of her.
translation.es: Es mala, Teddy. Deja que se encarguen de ella.

translation.en: Where are you taking me?
- The Doom Room. - The what?
No! I didn't do anything that bad!
Which is precisely why you're down here.
You. You, you, you.
Whom Rafal has chosen above all others.
translation.es: Rafal te eligió por encima de todos los demás.

translation.en: You could be the savior our school's been waiting for.
translation.es: Podrías ser la salvadora que estábamos esperando,

translation.en: But no.
You waste your time being distracted by foolish Everboy princes.
translation.es: Pierdes el tiempo distrayéndote con esos tontos príncipes.

translation.en: Please don't hurt me.
- You've been given a great gift, Sophie. -
One I will not let you sabotage.
translation.es: Y no dejaré que lo malgastes.

translation.en: The time has come…
for you to admit which side you're on.
translation.es: de que admitas de qué lado estás.

translation.en: Rafal only wants one who's truly Evil.
translation.es: Rafal solo quiere a alguien que sea realmente malo.

translation.en: It's clear your beauty is keeping you and others
translation.es: Está claro que tu belleza está impidiendo que tú y los demás

translation.en: - from accepting who you really are. -
translation.es: te acepten por lo que realmente eres.

translation.en: No! No!
Hey, meathead. Stop!
Oh God, what did I do now?
Apparently, you stood there while one of the giant dogs dragged Sophie away screaming.
translation.es: No hiciste nada mientras los lobos se llevaron a Sophie gritando.

translation.en: Hey, I rescue princesses and defeat Evil. I don't save it. Okay?
translation.es: Rescato princesas y derroto al mal, no lo protejo.

translation.en: You know who's Evil?
Yes. Because it's literally on the name of her school.
translation.es: Sí, está en el nombre de su escuela.

translation.en: Because I'm Good. That's what I'm supposed to do. That's what I have to do, okay?
translation.es: Yo soy bueno. Es lo que se supone que debo hacer.

translation.en: - Start getting the concept of this place. - No, I get it fine. And it's ridiculous.
translation.es: - Debes entender cómo funciona esto. - Lo entiendo, y es absurdo.

translation.en: You know that Evil stymph you killed?
Yeah, that was Gregor.
- No, it wasn't. I would have known that. - Mm, but you didn't.
translation.es: No, lo hubiera sabido. Pero no lo supiste.

translation.en: Are you sure?
Ask Dovey. And then come back and tell me how you know Evil when you see it.
translation.es: Pregúntale a Dovey, y luego dime qué tan bien reconoces al mal.

translation.en: You know what? Try thinking for yourself for a change,
and you might see past the black and white this school wants you to see.
translation.es: Quizá veas más que el blanco y negro que nos enseñan.

translation.en: You might be surprised by what you figure out.
Why is this happening to me?
Because it is your destiny.
Rafal?
You can be more than you ever dreamed you could be, Sophie. After all…
translation.es: Puedes ser más de lo que jamás soñaste, Sophie. Después de todo…

translation.en: Always remember how special you are.
translation.es: Recuerda siempre lo especial que eres.

translation.en: You're gonna change the world someday.
translation.es: Vas a cambiar el mundo algún día.

translation.en: And you are special, Sophie.
But they all refuse to see it.
translation.es: Pero los demás se niegan a verlo.

translation.en: You've been honest, kind, patient,
and did they admit you were Good?
I'm the only one you can trust.
Forget about their rules.
Do what you want, when you want.
translation.es: Haz lo que quieras, cuando quieras.

translation.en: And if they won't give you what's yours,
translation.es: Y si no te dan lo que te corresponde,

translation.en: take it.
Drawn in by Rafal's words,
translation.es: Atraída por las palabras de Rafal,

translation.en: Sophie decided she would do whatever it took to win Tedros
translation.es: Sophie decidió que haría lo que fuera para conquistar a Tedros y conseguir el beso de amor verdadero.

translation.en: - and gain true love's kiss. -
translation.es: para conquistar a Tedros y conseguir el beso de amor verdadero.

translation.en: Lose something?
Or just looking for another face to punch?
- Can't find Sophie. - Just want to make sure she's okay.
translation.es: No encuentro a Sophie. Solo quiero asegurarme de que esté bien.

translation.en: Well, I'm sure she won't miss this.
Big day today.
Both schools finally getting access to their magic.
translation.es: Ambas escuelas al fin obtendrán su magia.

translation.en: Hey, you should know some people are saying you're a witch.
translation.es: Para que sepas, algunos dicen que eres una bruja.

translation.en: Yeah, I've heard that before. Well…
translation.es: - Sí, lo he oído antes. - Bueno…

translation.en: For the record, I don't think you are.
translation.es: Quiero que sepas que yo no lo creo.

translation.en: Yeah?
Then what am I, hmm?
I wish I knew.
Because you're sure not like anybody I've ever met before.
translation.es: Porque nunca conocí a alguien como tú.

translation.en: I… I… can't do this.
Do what? Uh, fall down?
Shut up!
Everyone, find your seats.
- Let's begin. - Mm.
To access one's magic,
one must first unlock one's finger glow.
translation.es: primero debemos desbloquear el brillo del dedo.

translation.en: Once you've mastered your finger glow, it will prove to be invaluable.
translation.es: El brillo del dedo es una habilidad invaluable.

translation.en: I can't wait.
They say some people can transform into animals when they have their magic.
translation.es: Dicen que algunos pueden transformarse en animales.

translation.en: I want to turn into a cat at night so I can sleep under a stove.
translation.es: Quiero convertirme en un gato para dormir bajo una estufa.

translation.en: Oh, it'd be so warm.
Shall we?
Have no fear, Evers. -
Good feels no pain.
- Nevers…  -
…it's going to hurt.
- Oh good. - Ugh.
Line up!
- - Beautiful.
Your finger glow helps you become aware of the power inside you.
translation.es: Con el brillo del dedo, podrán detectar su poder interno.

translation.en: Thank you, ma'am.
When your finger glows, it means you've begun to tap into emotions
translation.es: El dedo les brillará cuando estén accediendo a emociones lo suficientemente fuertes

translation.en: - powerful enough… -
translation.es: cuando estén accediendo a emociones lo suficientemente fuertes

translation.en: - …to cast a spell. -
The stronger your feelings…
translation.es: Cuanto más fuerte sea su emoción,

translation.en: …the stronger your magic.
I hope I'm not late.
What is this all about?
This? Turns out you did me a favor.
translation.es: ¿Esto? Resulta que me hizo un favor.

translation.en: I was long overdue for a makeover.
Now, if you wouldn't mind activating my powers,
translation.es: Ahora, si pudiera activar mis poderes,

translation.en: I'd be most grateful.
Thank you.
Truce?
Now, who wants a facial?
Draw!
And whether Good or Evil, beauty is a full- time job.
translation.es: Y ya sean buenos o malos, la belleza exige tiempo completo.

translation.en: We need to talk.
- About? -
I have it under control.
I don't think you do.
So I'm supposed to take romantic advice
from a girl who used to make phlegm sculptures?
translation.es: una chica que hacía esculturas de flema?

translation.en: Why are you acting like this?
Because I'm tired of being pathetic little Sophie.
translation.es: Porque me harté de ser la Sophie patética.

translation.en: The girl who defended me with a frying pan wasn't pathetic.
translation.es: No lo eres. Me defendiste con una sartén.

translation.en: Well, I like the new me.
Okay, what's with the book?
Tedros's father chose his bride, Guinevere, for her beauty,
translation.es: El papá de Tedros eligió a Ginebra, su novia, por su belleza,

translation.en: but then she betrayed him with Lancelot.
translation.es: pero ella lo traicionó con Lancelot.

translation.en: King Arthur lost his throne and died of a broken heart.
translation.es: El rey Arturo perdió su trono y murió de pena.

translation.en: And this is supposed to be, what?
translation.es: ¿Y esto es un tema de conversación para una cita?

translation.en: - Date conversation? - Don't you get it?
translation.es: ¿Y esto es un tema de conversación para una cita? ¿No entiendes?

translation.en: After what happened to his father,
translation.es: Después de lo de su papá,

translation.en: Tedros isn't going to fall for someone just because she's hot.
translation.es: Tedros no se enamorará de ti solo por tu apariencia.

translation.en: You need to prove to him that you're Good,
in front of everybody, in a way no one can deny.
translation.es: frente a todos, de una forma que nadie pueda negar.

translation.en: Fine.
What do I have to do?
- Hi. -
Sorry. Didn't mean to distract you.
Heh. Nothing distracts me.
Then maybe I'm just good luck.
Don't flatter yourself.
It's prince's code. Your arrow flies straight if you're pure of heart.
translation.es: Es el código del príncipe. Es por nuestros corazones puros.

translation.en: What do you think you're doing?
Where I come from, girls are allowed to do anything boys do.
translation.es: De donde vengo, las chicas podemos hacer de todo.

translation.en: It's got nothing to do with you being a girl.
translation.es: No tiene nada que ver con eso.

translation.en: - Hmm? - Nevers can't shoot.
The whole lack of pure heart and all.
I told you, I am not a Never.
translation.es: Te dije que no soy una nunca.

translation.en: Oh, please, not a Never.
Keep your elbow tight.
Extend this and relax the grip.
translation.es: Extiende esto y relaja el agarre.

translation.en: It helps if you focus on the target.
Take it away.
Never doubted you for a minute.
Do you wanna hang out?
I don't know. With who?
Just some prince who wants to get to know you better.
translation.es: Un príncipe que quiere conocerte mejor.

translation.en: You're up.
Traitors.
I think I'm gonna be sick.
Ugh. I don't know what she sees in him.
translation.es: No sé por qué le gusta.

translation.en: It's an affront to us all.
translation.es: Es un insulto a todos nosotros.

translation.en: It's not right. I hate to say it.
This is bad.
She's mine.
Or ours.
She's a Never!
- It's bloody disgusting. - We should eat them.
They've been together all day.
So tragic.
You do know that no one's ever wanting to see us together.
translation.es: Sabes que nadie quiere vernos juntos.

translation.en: I do.
And me being with someone who they think's a Never
translation.es: Creen que estoy con una nunca.

translation.en: is gonna send the entire school into chaos.
I'd survive.
And they're all gonna lose their minds when I take you to the Evers Ball.
translation.es: Se volverán locos cuando te lleve al baile.

translation.en: What?
- Teddy, you promise? - Of course.
What?
You are not taking that underdressed she- wolf instead of me.
translation.es: No llevarás a esa loba mal vestida en vez de mí.

translation.en: One of you, do something.
- Going somewhere? -
- Down your throat! -
- Stop it! -
Why? Why are we still entertaining this preposterous--
Please! Please! Please!
Dating between Evers and Nevers is strictly against the rules.
translation.es: Las citas entre siempres y nuncas van en contra de las reglas.

translation.en: - Thank you. - Yes!
Evil and Good do not belong together.
translation.es: El mal y el bien no van de la mano.

translation.en: It's rep… repulsive.
Sir, if I may. I'm responsible for choosing Camelot's next queen.
translation.es: Señor, si me permite. Elegiré a la próxima reina de Camelot.

translation.en: I do not take that decision lightly.
translation.es: No lo tomo a la ligera.

translation.en: I chose Sophie because she is Good. She's just in the wrong school.
translation.es: Sophie es buena. Está en la escuela equivocada.

translation.en: If he believes it, why can't you?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me creen como él?

translation.en: Besides, nothing can keep true love apart.
translation.es: Además, nada puede separar el verdadero amor.

translation.en: Isn't that, like, the first rule of fairy tales?
translation.es: ¿No dicen eso los cuentos de hadas?

translation.en: If it is true love,
such a thing would certainly be momentous.
It seems to me there's only one way to be sure.
translation.es: Creo que solo hay una forma de estar seguros.

translation.en: A Trial by Tale!
- What? No! - But sir!
Sir, I accept.
Sorry. What is a Trial by Tale?
Each of you have to enter the Blue Forest on opposite sides.
translation.es: Cada uno debe entrar al Bosque Azul por lados opuestos.

translation.en: You have to defeat whatever danger presents itself and find each other by dawn.
translation.es: Deben vencer los peligros y encontrarse al amanecer.

translation.en: Help, strictly forbidden.
Sophie, we can do this.
We're good enough and strong enough to protect each other.
translation.es: Somos buenos y fuertes. Podemos protegernos.

translation.en: - We can do this. - What?
This will get them both killed!
The trial shall begin…
…at sundown.
Tedros of Camelot.
Sophie of Gavaldon.
A Trial by Tale is not to be taken lightly.
translation.es: La prueba de cuento no se debe tomar a la ligera.

translation.en: Mortal danger lurks beyond the school's gates.
translation.es: Peligros mortales acechan tras las puertas de la escuela.

translation.en: Do you still wish to proceed?
I do.
Yes.
Definitely.
If you wish to give up,
drop the red handkerchief on the ground, and you will be transported to safety.
translation.es: suelten el pañuelo rojo y serán transportados a un lugar seguro.

translation.en: - Let the trial begin. -
Tedros?
- - Hello?
I'm over here!
I'm ready to be saved!
Flowers. Pretty.
Let's stick to pretty.
- Hello, my little friends. -
We're all so beautiful.
It's me.
Help!
Tedros, help!
Tedros!
Tedros?
Tedros, where are you?
Okay.
Pumpkins are fun.
Tedros, help!
Tedros!
- Sophie, come on! Go, go, go! -
Sophie!
- Sophie! - It's okay. Okay.
Go to him. Once he saves you, kiss him, and then we can get out of this madhouse.
translation.es: Ve con él. Cuando te salve, bésalo, y saldremos de esta locura.

translation.en: - Okay? Go. -
- Sophie! - Tedros!
Oh, Tedros, thank God.
Sophie, grab Excalibur.
Help him.
- Sophie! Toss my sword, now! -
- - Sophie, do something!
What are you doing here?
You! You cheated!
- You brought Agatha! - No!
No, I came on my own. I swear.
- Yeah. - You knew she wouldn't help me.
translation.es: - Sí. - Sabías que no me ayudaría.

translation.en: - That's not true. - That's not fair.
Everyone knows the prince saves the princess, not the other way around.
translation.es: Los príncipes salvan a las princesas.

translation.en: - I can't change the world if I'm dead. -
translation.es: No puedo cambiar el mundo muerta.

translation.en: And I thought you were Good.
No. No, no, no. No, no. No!
You.
You did this.
I… I was just trying to help.
Sophie, you know you'd both be dead right now if I hadn't.
translation.es: Ambos estarían muertos si no hubiera…

translation.en: Liar. You knew this would happen.
First, you steal my school, and now you're trying to steal my prince.
translation.es: Me quitaste mi escuela, y ahora quieres a mi príncipe.

translation.en: How can you say that? I…  Sophie, I'm your best friend.
translation.es: ¿Cómo puedes decir eso? Sophie, soy tu mejor amiga.

translation.en: A princess can't be friends with a witch.
translation.es: Una princesa no puede ser amiga de una bruja.

translation.en: Where have you been?
Trying to talk to Sophie, but they locked her in her room.
Yes, they locked her in because she broke the rules. You both did.
translation.es: La encerraron en su cuarto porque rompieron las reglas.

translation.en: Why? Why did you help her in the trial?
translation.es: ¿Por qué la ayudaste en la prueba?

translation.en: Did you not think she could do it on her own?
I thought that you believed that Sophie was truly Good.
translation.es: ¿No creías que Sophie era buena de verdad?

translation.en: I don't.
I don't believe that anyone is truly Good or truly Evil,
translation.es: No creo que nadie sea bueno o malo de verdad,

translation.en: because people are complicated,
even if everybody in this place pretends they aren't.
Young lady.
- The rules of this school must be-- - Must be obeyed.
translation.es: Se deben obedecer… Las reglas de la escuela.

translation.en: You keep saying that, but what good are your rules
translation.es: Sigue diciendo lo mismo, pero ¿de qué sirven las reglas si no hacen nada cuando hay peligro?

translation.en: if you don't do anything about it when actual, dangerous Evil is here?
translation.es: pero ¿de qué sirven las reglas si no hacen nada cuando hay peligro?

translation.en: Please!
Sophie is many, many things, but I would hardly call her dangerous.
translation.es: Sophie podrá ser muchas cosas, pero no la llamaría peligrosa.

translation.en: Not Sophie. Rafal!
What did you just say?
Rafal. I saw him again in the forest,
translation.es: Rafal. Lo vi de nuevo en el bosque,

translation.en: but clearly, none of you have done anything about it.
translation.es: pero nadie hizo nada al respecto.

translation.en: Again?  What does that mean?
Have you seen Rafal before? Here?
Yeah. In the tower of blood I told the School Master about.
translation.es: Sí, salió de la torre de sangre. Se lo conté al rector.

translation.en: And Sophie saw him in her classroom.
translation.es: Y Sophie lo vio en una clase.

translation.en: So did Lady Lesso. Didn't she tell you?
I should have known.
Come with me. We will get to the bottom of this.
translation.es: Ven conmigo. Llegaremos al fondo de esto.

translation.en: Come on. Go!
Sophie?
…Agatha asked me to give you this.
translation.es: Agatha me pidió que te diera esto.

translation.en: I…
I hope you feel better soon.
translation.es: Espero que te sientas mejor pronto.

translation.en: Dear Sophie, I'm so sorry for what happened in the forest.
translation.es: Querida Sophie: Lamento mucho lo del bosque.

translation.en: I never meant to hurt you.
But whatever's going on, it's more than you getting a kiss from a prince.
translation.es: Todo esto se trata de más que un beso de un príncipe.

translation.en: I saw Rafal in the woods.
translation.es: Vi a Rafal en el bosque.

translation.en: I think what's happening here is bigger than anyone realizes.
translation.es: Creo que todo esto es más grave de lo que todos creen.

translation.en: It's true Evil, and we have to stick together.
translation.es: Es un mal de verdad, y debemos mantenernos juntas

translation.en: - - Only trust each other.
translation.es: y confiar la una en la otra.

translation.en: We're best friends.
You must know, no matter what, I'm on your side.
translation.es: Debes saber que, pase lo que pase, estoy de tu lado.

translation.en: - All my love, Aggie. -
Don't tell me you actually believe that.
translation.es: No me digas que crees eso.

translation.en: It's a lie.
And besides, that prince wasn't good enough for you anyway.
translation.es: Y ese príncipe no era bueno para ti.

translation.en: You're back?
- But I thought-- - I'd left you? Never.
Even if everyone else has betrayed you.
translation.es: Aunque todos los demás te hayan traicionado.

translation.en: - Aggie hasn't. - No?
- See for yourself. -
I thought you believed that Sophie was truly Good.
translation.es: ¿No creías que Sophie era buena de verdad?

translation.en: I don't.
- She's been lying to you, Sophie. -
Working against you from the very beginning.
translation.es: Trabajó en tu contra desde el principio.

translation.en: She means to drag you back to that miserable little village.
translation.es: Quiere arrastrarte de vuelta a ese deprimente pueblecito.

translation.en: But I'll protect you.
I'll help you.
Don't be scared.
Think of yourself as a caterpillar about to transform into a butterfly.
translation.es: Imagina que eres una oruga a punto de transformarse en mariposa.

translation.en: Very soon,
you'll emerge more beautiful and more powerful than ever.
translation.es: emergerás más hermosa y poderosa que nunca.

translation.en: A queen unlike this school has ever seen.
translation.es: Una reina nunca antes vista en esta escuela.

translation.en: I can give you abilities they only dream of.
translation.es: Puedo darte habilidades con las que el resto solo sueña.

translation.en: You'll not just be the fairest of them all,
translation.es: No solo serás la más bella de todas,

translation.en: you'll be the strongest.
Blood magic, Sophie.
My love…
…will you accept
this gift?
- - I will.
You knew Rafal was here, in the school, and you told no one?
translation.es: Sabías que Rafal estaba en la escuela, ¿y no le dijiste a nadie?

translation.en: Ah, must have slipped my mind.
I see! The soul of wickedness itself just slipped your mind, Lesso?
translation.es: Ya veo. ¿Se te olvidó mencionar haber visto al mal encarnado?

translation.en: I'm the Dean of the School for Evil.
translation.es: Soy la decana de la Escuela del Mal.

translation.en: Does that suggest anything to you?
Yeah, it suggests that nobody in charge here knows what's going on in this stupid place.
translation.es: Sí, que nadie a cargo sabe qué pasa en este tonto lugar.

translation.en: - Quiet, Reader! - Or what? You'll fail me for frowning?
translation.es: - Silencio, lectora. - ¿O me dará un fracaso?

translation.en: Now, what does Rafal want with Sophie?
For Evil to finally win!
That's what.
That's what you think will happen? Rafal won't help Evil win.
translation.es: ¿Eso esperas que pase? Rafal no ayudará a que el mal gane.

translation.en: When he tried to kill the School Master, his own brother,
translation.es: Cuando intentó matar al rector, su propio hermano,

translation.en: his goal was to destroy the school, both schools,
translation.es: su objetivo era destruir ambas escuelas

translation.en: so that he can keep all the magic in the world to himself.
translation.es: para quedarse con toda la magia del mundo.

translation.en: Thank you so much, beauty teacher.
Hey, I was the head of the Magical History Department
translation.es: Oye, fui la jefa del Departamento de Historia Mágica

translation.en: long before you got here, Red.
- You were? - Yes!
Before this place became insufferably shallow
translation.es: Antes de que todo se volviera frívolo,

translation.en: and I was demoted to beautification.
Do I look like I give a shit about smiling?
translation.es: ¿Parece que me importa una mierda sonreír?

translation.en: Okay, then we have to protect Sophie.
- And we will, as soon as we find her. -
translation.es: Y eso haremos apenas la hallemos.

translation.en: Sophie is missing.
- And Anemone is right. - Oh.
Rafal will destroy this entire school if he joins forces with Sophie.
translation.es: Rafal destruirá toda la escuela si se alía con Sophie.

translation.en: Lies. All lies!
This is just another ploy to have Good win again.
translation.es: Solo quieren que el bien vuelva a ganar.

translation.en: Trust me, it's not.
If my brother is back from the dead,
translation.es: Si mi hermano regresó de la muerte,

translation.en: there is a good chance none of us will survive, Lady Lesso.
translation.es: es muy probable que ninguno de nosotros sobreviva.

translation.en: None of us.
Go find Sophie now. Search both schools.
translation.es: Busquen a Sophie en ambas escuelas.

translation.en: Yes, of course.
And Agatha.
Go to the Evers Ball.
Sophie may very well show there. If she does, bring her to me.
translation.es: Quizá Sophie se aparezca ahí. Si lo hace, tráemela.

translation.en: Now, go.
Living doll.
- Sophie? -
You're not… Oh my God.
What has Rafal done to you?
Taught me to accept who I truly am, that's what.
translation.es: Me enseñó a aceptar lo que realmente soy.

translation.en: Isn't that what you wanted?
I am a thing of beauty, am I not?
The poison apple to Rafal's eye.
translation.es: Soy la niña malvada de los ojos de Rafal.

translation.en: The one whose talents soar above all others.
translation.es: Mis talentos superan a los de todos los demás.

translation.en: Please don't tell me you're jealous.
translation.es: No me digas que estás celosa.

translation.en: Leonora of Gavaldon.
Rafal told me.
Leonora, the lonely Reader who wanted to be so much more.
translation.es: Leonora, la lectora solitaria que quería ser tanto más.

translation.en: He saw something in you.
An Evil you didn't know you had.
translation.es: Un mal que no sabías que tenías.

translation.en: - - And so he brought you here to nurture it.
translation.es: Así que te trajo aquí para alimentarlo.

translation.en: You tried so hard, but you weren't Evil enough for him.
translation.es: Te esforzaste mucho, pero no eras lo suficientemente malvada.

translation.en: So he turned his back on you, despite your love for him.
translation.es: Así que te abandonó, a pesar de que lo amaras.

translation.en: And you've been trying to prove yourself to him ever since…
translation.es: Y llevas todo este tiempo intentando demostrarle tu valor,

translation.en: …hoping to win him over.
But then along comes Sophie.
What has he promised you?
And what have you promised him?
You're both such dolls to ask.
- - Sophie…
- - My God.
I was worried you wouldn't come without an invite.
But then I thought, You know Agatha. She does what she wants.
translation.es: pero recordé que siempre haces lo que quieres.

translation.en: Tedros, have you seen Sophie?
Look, for once, can we talk about something else? Like what happened in the forest?
translation.es: Hablemos de otra cosa, como de lo que pasó en el bosque.

translation.en: - That was-- - Yes, later. Once I've found her.
translation.es: - Eso fue… - Después de que la encuentre.

translation.en: She yells at you, she disrespects you, she blames you for everything wrong in her life,
translation.es: Te grita, te falta el respeto y te culpa de todo lo malo en su vida,

translation.en: yet all you do is help her.
Come on, why do you even think she deserves saving?
translation.es: ¿Por qué crees que merece ser salvada?

translation.en: Look, back in Gavaldon, all my life, they've called me a witch.
translation.es: En Gavaldon, toda mi vida me llamaron bruja.

translation.en: They told me to my face how ugly I am
translation.es: Me decían lo fea que era

translation.en: and how someday they'll get around to burning me and my mom.
translation.es: y cómo esperaban quemarme a mí y a mi mamá algún día.

translation.en: And the whole village just laughs,
translation.es: Y todo el pueblo se reía,

translation.en: except for Sophie.
She's the only one who has stood up for me from the time we were kids.
translation.es: Es la única que me ha defendido desde que éramos niñas.

translation.en: She's like my sister,
and I'm not someone who gives up on family.
translation.es: y no soy alguien que abandone a su familia.

translation.en: Not ever.
No, you're… you're right.
No one should ever give up on family.
Agatha, you saved me from that reaper,
translation.es: Agatha, me salvaste de ese segador,

translation.en: and you made me want to see the world in more than just black and white.
translation.es: y me hiciste ver los matices del mundo.

translation.en: And no one has ever done anything like that for me before.
translation.es: Nadie había hecho algo así por mí.

translation.en: And it made me realize you are my true love.
translation.es: Y eso me hizo darme cuenta de que eres mi verdadero amor.

translation.en: - Oh my God, you've got the worst timing. - No, really.
translation.es: - Dios mío, es el peor momento. - No, en serio.

translation.en: I've thought it through, and I… I love you, Agatha.
translation.es: Lo pensé bien y te amo, Agatha.

translation.en: Tedros, please, please stop.
Rafal is using Sophie to take down the schools.
Uh, wait, who's Rafal?
Sophie, what happened to you?
- My God. - Don't worry, Teddy.
Should clear up by tomorrow.
Try to look past it and not ruin our evening.
translation.es: Intenta ignorarlo para no arruinar nuestra noche.

translation.en: The Evers Ball!
Here I am.
You're taking me, remember?
- You promised. - Sophie, please.
Quiet, Aggie. The protagonists are speaking.
- - I'm still your date, right?
You going back on your promise?
Because… bad things happen…  …when the Good break their promises.
translation.es: Pasan cosas malas cuando los buenos rompen sus promesas.

translation.en: There is no promise. You betrayed me. I'm here with Agatha.
translation.es: Esa promesa ya no existe. Me traicionaste. Vine con Agatha.

translation.en: - No. Whoa, no. He's not. - Liar.
You know, I think I'm really getting the hang of this.
translation.es: Creo que me estoy acostumbrando a esto.

translation.en: Sophie, stop.
- Whatever's happened, I can help you. -
translation.es: Lo que sea que haya pasado, puedo ayudarte.

translation.en: I'm your friend.
You're my nemesis.
Which means our story can't end until one of us is destroyed.
translation.es: así que nuestra historia no puede terminar hasta que una de nosotras sea destruida.

translation.en: Bye.
- Tedros. -
Come quick.
So, does this mean the ball is canceled?
translation.es: ¿Esto significa que el baile está cancelado?

translation.en: We have to stop her.
No, no, no. Nobody hurt Sophie.
Look at what she's done.
Our only hope is to kill her before she destroys us all.
translation.es: Debemos matarla antes de que nos destruya.

translation.en: Men, grab your weapons.
- It's time to kill the witch! - Stop!
Evil attacks, Good defends, remember?
You can't attack!
My dear Nevers!
We have guests.
- - How should we greet them?
We'll kill 'em!
Just leave them alone!
Sophie, please. They were just scared you were going to attack them.
translation.es: Por favor. Solo temían que fueras a atacarlos.

translation.en: Now, why would we ever do that?
That would be such an Evil thing to do.
Let's show them how Good we really are.
- - Let's dance.
- - Say hello to our guests.
Here's some party favors, boys.
Draw!
Tedros, it's a trick!
- Kill the witch! -
Fire!
Well, now.
If Evil attacks and Good defends,
translation.es: Si el mal ataca y el bien defiende,

translation.en: then it would appear that Good has become Evil.
translation.es: pareciera que el bien se volvió malo.

translation.en: - And Evil has become Good. -
translation.es: Y que el mal se volvió bueno.

translation.en: Oh, so Good.
Get out, Tedros!
- - Teddy, we have so much to talk about.
translation.es: Teddy, tenemos tanto de qué hablar.

translation.en: You and your little army just tried to kill a roomful of innocent people.
translation.es: Tú y tu pequeño ejército intentaron matar a gente inocente.

translation.en: Now that is quite Evil indeed.
translation.es: Eso sí que es muy malo.

translation.en: Looks like someone's been auditing Uglification.
translation.es: Parece que tomaron la clase de Afeamiento.

translation.en: - - No!
Please, Sophie.
You have to stop this!
It's too late.
They attacked. Now we defend!
Stop!
- - Who wants hot chocolate?
Call yourself a prince, Teddy?
No, listen! Wait!
Just listen to me!
Coming, my queen!
No! Tedros!
That felt wonderful. Been dying to do that all semester.
translation.es: Eso fue genial. Quise hacerlo durante todo el semestre.

translation.en: Tedros! Oh, Tedros! No!
Back off, Aggie!
This is my happy ending.
So this is how you change the world?
This is what you've always wanted? To simply have it all at your feet?
translation.es: ¿Esto es lo que siempre quisiste? ¿Tenerlo todo a tus pies?

translation.en: Yup. The only mistake I made was thinking I needed to switch schools.
translation.es: Sí. Mi único error fue pensar que debía cambiarme de escuela.

translation.en: It was just the schools that needed to switch.
translation.es: Eran las escuelas las que debían cambiar.

translation.en: The mistake you made was thinking you needed any of this.
translation.es: Tu error fue pensar que necesitabas todo esto.

translation.en: Look what it's done to you!
Look at what it has done to us.
translation.es: Mira lo que nos hizo a nosotras.

translation.en: Sophie, Rafal is the enemy.
- We have to defeat him. -
- - I'd rather defeat my nemesis.
Sophie, don't!
No! No! Oh my--
Sophie!
Now… just one last score to settle.
translation.es: Bien, solo me queda un último detalle.

translation.en: - School Master. -  Where are you, old man?
Time to pay for your mistake!
Seeking revenge,
Sophie searched the tower for the one person who had wronged her from the start.
translation.es: Sophie buscó a la persona que la perjudicó desde el comienzo.

translation.en: Or so she believed.
What does that mean?
It means your tale has just begun, Sophie of Gavaldon.
translation.es: Que tu historia acaba de comenzar, Sophie de Gavaldon.

translation.en: This was all a test, Sophie.
translation.es: Todo esto fue una prueba, Sophie.

translation.en: All of it.
A test… to find my true love.
translation.es: Una prueba para encontrar mi verdadero amor.

translation.en: I don't understand.
I was the one who answered your wish and brought you here.
translation.es: Fui yo quien concedió tu deseo y te trajo aquí.

translation.en: The seers told me of your potential, and I wanted to help you fulfill it.
translation.es: Los videntes mencionaron tu potencial, y quise ayudarte a alcanzarlo.

translation.en: Who else has believed in you…
cared for you,
defended you,
given you everything?
When you use that power,
and watch your enemies fall,
translation.es: y ves caer a tus enemigos,

translation.en: how does it feel?
- - I like it.
You were never meant for Good.
translation.es: No fuiste hecha para el bien.

translation.en: And of course, neither was I.
Why did you pose as the School Master?
He was my brother.
Centuries ago,
we were entrusted the Storian for eternity
translation.es: nos confiaron a la Autora por toda la eternidad

translation.en: because our bond overrode our warring souls.
translation.es: porque nuestro vínculo era más fuerte que nuestras diferencias.

translation.en: As long as we protected each other, we would stay immortal… and young.
translation.es: Mientras nos protegiéramos, seguiríamos siendo inmortales y jóvenes.

translation.en: Good and Evil, in perfect balance.
translation.es: El bien y el mal en perfecto equilibrio.

translation.en: But time…
time makes one discontent.
What happened to him?
- We fought… -
…and I killed him.
You killed your brother?
How could you do that?
Well, the same way you tried to kill your beloved prince.
translation.es: De la misma forma que intentaste matar a tu príncipe.

translation.en: Because it's who we are.
After my brother's death,
I assumed his identity to hide my true intent.
translation.es: tomé su identidad para ocultar mi verdadero objetivo.

translation.en: Started destroying the balance from within.
There are no mistakes in the School for Good and Evil.
translation.es: No hay errores en la Escuela del Bien y del Mal.

translation.en: But Good has won for 200 years.
translation.es: Pero el bien ha ganado por 200 años.

translation.en: Oh, have they now?
Story by story, I have corrupted them.
Rewarding them for burning old ladies in ovens,
translation.es: Los recompensé por quemar ancianas en hornos,

translation.en: making mermaids cut out their tongues,
forcing women to dance in red- hot iron shoes.
translation.es: y forzar a mujeres a usar zapatos al rojo vivo.

translation.en: Good became vain.
Foolish.
Weak.
But you, Sophie?
You put me to shame.
You brought the whole school to its knees in weeks.
translation.es: Pusiste a la escuela de rodillas en semanas.

translation.en: Beyond Good and Evil, you…
translation.es: Eres más que el bien o el mal. Eres el caos en sí mismo.

translation.en: are chaos itself.
translation.es: Eres el caos en sí mismo.

translation.en: - And together, we are unstoppable. -
Agatha!
- Tedros? -
Hey.
You all right?
Oh my God, I thought you were dead.
translation.es: Dios mío, pensé que estabas muerto.

translation.en: I'm fine. Listen to me.
I need to put an end to the Nevers, once and for all.
translation.es: Debo acabar con los nuncas de una vez.

translation.en: No, no, no, Tedros.
This whole war thing between the schools, it's all wrong.
translation.es: Esta guerra entre las escuelas está mal.

translation.en: - If I can get through to Sophie-- - After what she's done?
translation.es: Si pudiera… ¿Después de lo que hizo? No funcionará.

translation.en: No point. No way. It's not gonna work.
translation.es: ¿Después de lo que hizo? No funcionará.

translation.en: No, no, no. She's being used by the School Master's brother.
translation.es: El hermano del decano la está manipulando.

translation.en: He's given her blood magic, and it's too much for her.
translation.es: Le dio magia de sangre. No sabe lo que hace.

translation.en: - She doesn't know what she's doing. - No, she knows.
translation.es: Le dio magia de sangre. No sabe lo que hace. Lo sabe muy bien.

translation.en: I can reach her.
- I know it. - Listen to me.
- What? - She's gone.
She turned into a raven and went up to the School Master's tower.
translation.es: Se convirtió en un cuervo y voló donde el rector.

translation.en: - What? - The fight's down here, Agatha.
It's time to let her go.
Tedros, you told me you were ready to see the world in more than just black and white.
translation.es: Dijiste que te hice ver los matices del mundo.

translation.en: - Mm- hmm. - This is your chance.
Please, I just need you to trust me.
translation.es: Por favor, solo necesito que confíes en mí.

translation.en: Come with me to save Sophie. That is how we'll save the school.
translation.es: Ayúdame a salvarla. Así salvaremos a la escuela.

translation.en: - Evers and Nevers. -
translation.es: A los siempres y los nuncas.

translation.en: - Please. - Tedros, help! We can't hold them.
Okay. Go to her.
I'll be there as soon as I can. I promise you.
translation.es: Iré apenas pueda. Te lo prometo.

translation.en: - And will you join me, Sophie? -
All we need is our true love's kiss,
translation.es: Solo necesitamos el beso de amor verdadero,

translation.en: Evil's kiss, to unlock our love
translation.es: el beso del mal, para liberar nuestro amor

translation.en: and forever open the gates to Never After
translation.es: y abrir para siempre las puertas a Nunca Jamás.

translation.en: for you and I… to rule.
translation.es: Para que tú y yo lo gobernemos todo.

translation.en: I am your prince.
I am your true love.
I always have been.
Will you join me?
Yes. Yes.
And so it was that Evil had finally won true love's kiss,
translation.es: Y así fue que el mal al fin consiguió el beso de amor verdadero

translation.en: condemning both schools and all those within their walls,
translation.es: y condenó a ambas escuelas y a todos sus alumnos y profesores,

translation.en: Good and Evil alike,
to perish in agony,
- allowing Rafal's Evil… - Yes!  …true Evil, to overtake the world.
translation.es: lo que le permitió al mal de Rafal conquistar el mundo.

translation.en: What have I done?
- Why does anyone have to die? -
translation.es: ¿Por qué todos deben morir? Creí que querías que ganara el mal.

translation.en: I thought you wanted Evil to win. Those are my friends.
translation.es: ¿Por qué todos deben morir? Creí que querías que ganara el mal. Son mis amigos.

translation.en: They are merely fairy- tale Evil.
translation.es: Solo son malos de cuentos de hadas.

translation.en: We must wipe the slate clean to make way for true Evil.
translation.es: Debemos partir de cero para dar paso a la verdadera maldad.

translation.en: Welcome to Never After, my love.
translation.es: Bienvenida a Nunca Jamás, mi amor.

translation.en: No! I didn't want to hurt them. I thought you said we'd just rule them.
translation.es: ¡No! No quería lastimarlos. Dijiste que los gobernaríamos.

translation.en: And we will rule Never After,
where every one of those students,
every professor, anyone who could challenge us, is dead.
translation.es: cada profesor o cualquier amenaza están muertos,

translation.en: Including… your nemesis.
Oh!
translation.es: AQUÍ YACE EL CUERPO DE AGATHA

translation.en: No, Aggie!
translation.es: AQUÍ YACE EL CUERPO DE AGATHA ¡No, Aggie!

translation.en: This is not what I wanted!
Oh, it's too late for that now, Sophie.
translation.es: Es demasiado tarde para eso, Sophie.

translation.en: You've driven away everyone,
lied to everyone, betrayed everyone.
translation.es: les mentiste a todos, traicionaste a todos.

translation.en: You're all alone now.
That's why you're mine.
Get away from her!
Aggie!
You're alive?
- I'm so sorry. - It's okay. I got you.
translation.es: Lo siento tanto. Está bien. Ya estoy aquí.

translation.en: You know, I expected more from a Reader.
Surely you know what happens to those who thwart love.
translation.es: Seguro sabes lo que les pasa a los que obstaculizan el amor.

translation.en: This isn't love.
Do you know why Good always wins?
translation.es: ¿Sabes por qué el bien siempre gana?

translation.en: Because we fight for each other, and we care for each other.
translation.es: Porque luchamos el uno por el otro y nos cuidamos.

translation.en: That is what Good's love is.
translation.es: Así es el amor del bien.

translation.en: Evil only fights for itself.
translation.es: El mal solo lucha por sí mismo.

translation.en: And that is the furthest thing from love on Earth.
translation.es: Y eso ni se le acerca al amor de verdad.

translation.en: Such beautiful words
that have no power or meaning anymore.
translation.es: que ya no tienen poder ni significado.

translation.en: Now, if you'll please step away from my bride.
translation.es: Ahora, por favor, aléjate de mi novia.

translation.en: You will never have her, you monster.
Not as long as I'm alive.
Well, as you wish.
- - No! Not Aggie!
- - Sophie!
- Sophie? -
- - No. No!
It can't be.
Not after all this.
No. No, no, no.
Did you really think it would be that easy?
translation.es: ¿De verdad creíste que sería tan fácil?

translation.en: - - In my school?
In your father's hands, that sword might once have vanquished me.
translation.es: En las manos de tu padre, esa espada podría haberme vencido,

translation.en: But in the hands of his ridiculous whelp of a son,
translation.es: pero en las manos de su ridículo hijo

translation.en: it is merely an oversized butter knife.
translation.es: es apenas un cuchillo de mantequilla.

translation.en: You think this tale…
is about your true love.
translation.es: se trata de tu verdadero amor.

translation.en: No, it's about mine.
And the power Evil's kiss gave me
translation.es: Y del poder que me dio el beso del mal

translation.en: to kill Good's future king.
translation.es: para matar al futuro rey del bien.

translation.en: Or the tale of the girls who stopped you.
translation.es: O de las chicas que te detuvieron.

translation.en: The end.
Oh my God.
- Hey. Oh my God.  -
Oh my God. It's okay.
Hey. Hi.
Aggie…
I'm so sorry for everything.
Shh. You're fine. You're okay.
You're safe now.
I don't wanna be Evil.
No, you are not Evil.
You're just human.
As long as I have you.
We will always have each other.
You promise?
I promise.
I love you, Aggie.
You'll always be… my best friend.
Hey. Hey.
No, please come back.
I love you too.
Oh my God.
Hi. Hi.
- Hi. - Hey.
Hey.
Oh, I'm sorry, am I hurting you?
Oh my God.
Don't ever do that again.
Let's go home.
Yeah.
Let's go home.
And so it was that our heroes defeated the greatest threat
translation.es: Y así fue que nuestras heroínas derrotaron la mayor amenaza

translation.en: the School for Good and Evil had ever known.
translation.es: que la Escuela del Bien y del Mal había conocido.

translation.en: The world of fairy tales had not perished,
translation.es: El mundo de los cuentos de hadas no desapareció,

translation.en: but it had been changed forever.
- - Good and Evil together?
- - One school?
Now what?
Unity, perhaps.
Maybe… friendship, even.
Well…
- Well, no rush. No rush. - No. Slow and steady wins the race.
translation.es: No nos apresuremos. Pasito a pasito también se llega.

translation.en: Hi there.
My heart belongs to another.
translation.es: Mi corazón le pertenece a otra.

translation.en: As for our two heroes, there was finally a way back to Gavaldon,
translation.es: En cuanto a nuestras dos heroínas, al fin consiguieron regresar a Gavaldon,

translation.en: as Agatha's kiss had set them free.
translation.es: ya que el beso de Agatha las había liberado.

translation.en: For what is truer than the love between friends?
translation.es: ¿Qué es más verdadero que el amor entre amigas?

translation.en: It's definitely best if I go.
Aggie, if you want to stay here with Tedros, I understand.
translation.es: Aggie, lo entendería si quieres quedarte con Tedros.

translation.en: I'll take care of your mom.
It would be my honor.
Thank you, Sophie.
- - But I can't leave my friend.
translation.es: Pero no abandonaré a mi amiga.

translation.en: Thank you, Tedros, for wanting to change.
I hope we'll see each other again someday.
translation.es: Espero que nos volvamos a ver algún día.

translation.en: Wait! Wait!
Both girls were met with open arms…
translation.es: Ambas chicas fueron recibidas con brazos abiertos

translation.en: …and open minds.
They never felt so special.
Although some things never change.
- Witch! Witch! - Burn! Witch!
That is, unless you use your power to begin to change them.
translation.es: A menos que uses tu poder para empezar a cambiarlas.

translation.en: And that, you could say, is the end of our story.
translation.es: Y se podría decir que ese es el final de nuestra historia.

translation.en: However, as Tedros's arrow pierced the vortex between their worlds…
translation.es: Sin embargo, cuando la flecha de Tedros atravesó el vórtice entre sus mundos…

translation.en: I need you, Agatha.
…it became clear that this was only…
…the beginning.
♪ I'm staring into the darkness ♪ ♪ And I like what I see ♪
translation.es: BASADO EN EL LIBRO DE SOMAN CHAINANI

translation.en: ♪ The princesses of Good are we ♪ ♪ So proudly ♪ ♪ We proclaim ♪
